COMMAND.NAME: styletoselection
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.

DESCRIPTION.P: Set the selection in a buffer everywhere a given style is in the buffer
NOTE: this does not clear the old selection, it will just add to it.

COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
